decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive Boros creatures and spells to deal damage quickly to the opponent. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, while using cards like Static Prison and Guide of Souls to control the board. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds versatility and consistency to the deck. Additionally, cards like Goblin Bombardment and Amped Raptor provide extra reach and damage potential. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and close out the game efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the combo potential of Broodscale Bloodchief and other supporting cards to quickly generate powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent. By efficiently ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and other lands, while also utilizing cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to control the board, the deck aims to establish a dominant position and close out the game with powerful finishers like Walking Ballista and Glaring Fleshraker. The inclusion of cards like The One Ring and Delighted Halfling add additional utility and versatility to the deck.

The main concept of this Ruby Storm combo deck is to generate a large amount of mana quickly using rituals and medallions, while utilizing Ral, Monsoon Mage and other spells to dig for combo pieces and create a storm count. By casting Past in Flames, the player can then recast all their spells from the graveyard to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes additional card draw and manipulation to help find key cards, as well as land fetches to ensure consistent mana production.

This deck focuses on using ramp to quickly get out powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Ulamog, Emrakul, and Nulldrifter. The control aspect is achieved through cards like Kozilek's Command and Through the Breach, allowing for disruption and removal of threats. The Palant√≠r of Orthanc provides card advantage and selection, while Consign to Memory can deal with troublesome permanents. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures and versatile control spells, making it difficult for the opponent to keep up and ultimately leading to victory.

The main concept of this deck is to create a powerful combo using Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate a large number of tokens and pump them up to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Utilizing cards like Ancient Stirrings and Eldrazi Temple for ramp and consistency, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence and aggressive threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combination of Shifting Woodland and Omniscience to quickly assemble powerful combos and control the board. By utilizing cards like Malevolent Rumble, Flare of Denial, and Karn, the Great Creator, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while setting up its own win condition. With a mix of card draw, tutoring, and powerful creatures like Griselbrand, Fallaji Archaeologist, and Oracle of Tragedy, the deck can quickly overwhelm the opponent with its game-winning plays.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck utilizes a mix of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with impactful spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge to control the board and secure victory. Additionally, the inclusion of Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment provides additional ways to close out the game or deal direct damage to the opponent.
